Think your home’s clean enough? You may need to think again. 
A housework checklist from the Good Housekeeping Institute shows just how often you should be doing all those household chores. 
Some should be carried out every day to prevent the spread of germs, others weekly or less often. 
It comes after a Mintel poll found the time we spend cleaning each week has fallen by 32 minutes since 2014 to four hours and seven minutes today. 
Good Housekeeping said: “Housework can feel like a never-ending task – so, by popular demand, we’ve created a guide to what to clean when.” You should be cleaning your house more often than you think (Photo: Getty) Daily
